title: Best Supp In Current Meta?????
body: Who do you think is the best support in the current meta that has a really aggresive play style. Cause I need to buy a supp champ for rank

replies.body: Vanguards.. tanky and cc for days means easy gank opportunities for the soon to be gangbang bot lane.
Zyra easy choice , you'll probably out damage your adc in most games
Maybe brand , but not any mid laner

The point is doing damage without items with cc or disengage which both have..................
If you know better please share
That doesn't help , give better options

He asked for 'a' supp so i gave one
Stop beating around the bush and start talking about the 'other' better options
The forums aren't for trash talking , if you have something better spit it out or don't waste everyone's time here

I main Draven because i like playing him not because of lcs , and have been for a long time
Anyways I know zyra is strong because i have played against her and with her , if you have an opinion that states otherwise , expalin it or gtfo

Wtf is your problem ?
Is zyra good or not ?
If she is good , people don't need your permission to play her so basically gtfo
Trolls with low IQs are the most annoying no?

Ignore this guy, Mae. Some folks just want to get on their soapbox. They don't care about your win rate. 

Mute calmly, and carry hard.

Let's just be thankful we can only see rank, and not bank account, career advancement, social skills, and lady slaying.

Edit: Chest hair
If that is what you really cared about we would have seen one of your comments up there relating to the original post

I would actually say Sona. She's pretty easy and also fairly flexible. You can definitely be aggressive in lane, but if things go south you can still fall back and play more protective/sustain for laning. 

For builds, you can also go for more damage, with frost queen's, Lich Bane, Censer, and some other AP. Or, she does well with the locket/redemption build, too. That'll offer a bit more survivability for her, but you'll lose out on some damage.
depends on what elo you're in, tactical advantages change with higher mechanic skills

Zilean, especially if you play him AP. The more AP and CD, the more effective his kits are. He laughs at Leona, Thresh, even Janna ! 
Though as Zilean, personally I found the most annoying to play against Alistar and Brand.

{{champion:432}} before people downvote.... considering the mf, malz and burst damage supports in bot lane... his ult counters theirs... 

and he can heal. and its fukin bard !!

but other ideas : 

{{champion:40}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:44}}

for aggresive supps, blitz has the highest winrate at all ranks. But if your looking for top supports with damage then youve got 3 main options: Zyra, Malz, Brand. Malz recently got voidlings nerfed so either brand or zyra if your looking for a solid damage supp. Either is a good choice, if  youd like a break down of the diff between brand and zyra supp just ask XD
I would add to this Vel'Koz who's poke is godly, and if you're maxing his W then {{item:3303}} is proc'ing all the time.

I agree that velkoz is most definitly a solid damage support, played it myself and its pretty fun. The only reason i didnt include him is cuz hes asking for the best, and altho vel works good, id put the others above him
If you mean ACTUAL supports. It's probably Leona. She's tanky, tons of cc, low cds, decent damage, great peel etc. Now if you don't care then i'd suggest zyra cause OP as fuk or lux
